changeSet.createView: SELECT sqe.use_id AS use_id, s.ski_type AS ski_type, s.ski_description AS ski_description, SUM(sqe.sqe_skill_value) AS total FROM student_question_event sqe INNER JOIN skill s ON sqe.ski_id = s.ski_id GROUP BY sqe.use_id, s.ski_type, s.ski_description ORDER BY s.ski_type ASC
